basic_info.description: Hi there! I'm a Competitive Programmer and a Candidate Master at Codeforces, with a 6 Star rating on Codechef. I'm also a Front-end Developer and a DevOps Engineer, constantly working to hone my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends. I hail from IIIT Gwalior, where I gained a solid foundation in computer science and software development. I've always had a passion for problem-solving, which led me to pursue competitive programming and participate in various coding competitions. Despite my technical expertise, I also have a creative side that comes through in my front-end development work. I love using my programming skills to bring beautiful and user-friendly interfaces to life. Outside of work, I enjoy spending time with my family and friends in my hometown of Indore.

projects.title: ALGORITHM VISUALISER
projects.description: This is a web application which is capable of visualising algorithms and data structures. Implemented Various Graph Algorithms. A Dictionary is created which takes random Users from an API and Auto complete Feature is created which uses Trie.

projects.title: SIMILARITY-CHECKER
projects.description: Similarity-Checker is a web application which is capable of finding text similarity between two or more uploaded files. The uploaded files are first converted into string format and then these strings are been compared. This application can be help full in deriving plagiarism between different documents. :)

projects.title: TEXT AUTO COMPLETION
projects.description: Implemented using Edit Distance, N-Gram Language model And Noisy Channel Model Algorithm.Natural language processing based project for text completion and correction.!
